page.title: 13Education-Primary
page.content:
Primary Education
{Primary Schools Ysgol Gymraeg Caerfili,a Welsh language school, has an age range between 4+ and 11+,then they transfer to Ysgol Gyfun Cwm Rhymni. Hendredenny Park is an English language school. It has a nursery department and accepts children at 3+. They transfer to St. Cennydd at 11+. {Infant Schools. Twyn,Plas-y-Felin, Cwm Ifor and Hendre. The age range is 4+ to 7+. These are English language schools. {Junior Schools.} Twyn, Plas-y-Felin, Cwm Ifor and Hendre. The age range is 7+ to 11+. These are English language schools.
